metadata.title: CVE-2020-15397 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: HylaFAX+ through 7.0.2 and HylaFAX Enterprise have scripts that execute binaries from directories writable by unprivileged users (e.g., locations under /var/spool/hylafax that are writable by the uucp account). This allows these users to execute code in the context of the user calling these binaries (often root).

criterions.comment: hylafax package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
